about_the_game: Isekai’d is an anime-style open-world RPG with up to 4-player co-op. Name your party and make it known across the world by rising through the guild ranks to become S-rank adventurers. Defeat bosses, complete quests, explore dungeons and make choices that actually shape the world around you and its fate. With the looming threat of the Demon Lord’s return, will your party stop him, join him, become demon lords yourselves, or carve a different path entirely?
detailed_description: Isekai’d is an anime-style open-world RPG with up to 4-player co-op. Name your party and make it known across the world by rising through the guild ranks to become S-rank adventurers. Defeat bosses, complete quests, explore dungeons and make choices that actually shape the world around you and its fate. With the looming threat of the Demon Lord’s return, will your party stop him, join him, become demon lords yourselves, or carve a different path entirely?
name: Isekai'd

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Open-world RPG with up to 4-player co-op. Name your party and make it known across the world by rising through the guild ranks to become S-rank adventurers. With the looming threat of the Demon Lord’s return, will your party stop him, join him, become demon lords yourselves, or something else?
